description:
Shiloh is friends with Aiden, who clearly has been having a lot of fun at ChaosMen, so he sent in pics. The tattoo work is kinda crazy, but it is so nicely done, and feels more like a Trademark, rather then graffiti. I certainly suits him. He says people love it or hate, so of course I am hoping you all with love it.
He is a really handsome guy with natural body hair. Based on his solo, it sounds like he likes hot passionate sex with dudes, but I guess is still dating girls. Not sure how long that will last, but always eager to get a local guy who can come in and help Service first timers.
He is more of a Top then a Bottom, but sounds like he is totally versatile.
Gonna toss a blow job video his way so we can check out his oral skills.
Enjoy!
title: Shiloh - Solo
